item.title: 1 more thing :)
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

sorry for all the posts this is my first pi and im hoping to finish it up today. Ive spent like a week spawning monsters, editing drops, changing shops, and all that noob stuff :). Im starting to get into things i dont know how to do. So my question is im trying to make a stall where u click it and get 100k. Im using clickobject i think thats right (correct me if im wrong) but cant get it

case 4876:
c.getitem(995, 100000);
sendgfx(***)
c.sendmessage(You steal 100k)
break;

its not really working that well, can anyone help me fix this up?

Read full topic
